org.grouplens.lenskit.eval

Class EvalTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.Target
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.EvalTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListenableFuture<java.lang.Object>, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Object>, org.apache.tools.ant.TaskContainer

    public class EvalTarget
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Target
implements ListenableFuture<java.lang.Object>
    Targets in an evaluator project. This class extends Ant targets with the Future interface, providing access to the value of the last task executed. Non-eval tasks (standard Ant tasks) have null values.
